text: Achinkulungwa wa mwa wandu wa Firiauna ni watite (pa kunchoonga Firiauna): “Ana nitin'gambe kunnechelesya Musa ni wandu wakwe kuti awatanganyeje pa chilambo, ni antundumalile mmwe ni milungu jenu?” Jwalakwe jwatite: “Chituwulaje wanache wao wachilume nikwaleka umi wanache wao wachikongwe, soni chisimu uwwe pa wanganyao tukwete machili gakwakombolela.”
